Text.Page:
, I need your help with some banquet-related business.
Please find me in Highwatch.

- Meren

Meren is planning a magnificent banquet to be held in Velik's honor.
Meren asked for your help with locating the long-lost Eternal Crown, and returning it to the goddess.

Although you successfully retrieved the Crown from the past, it seems to have somehow lost its celestial aura.

Thank the Goddess you're here, .

My name is Meren, and as I mentioned in my letter, I need your help.

I don't know if you're aware, but the citizens of Velika are planning a banquet to honor the goddess.
It's going to be magnificent, so there's lots to prepare.

There's so many things to plan, and we just got news that Velik herself will grace us with her presence.

And that's where you come in. I need your help to procure a very special gift."What's the gift?"

It's called the Eternal Crown.

According to ancient accounts, the crown is imbued with a celestial aura, the type of shich hasn't been seen in many generations.

The last known location of the crown was Castle Aranea, but that was long ago, before the castle fell into ruin."I doubt it's still there."

True, but thanks to Halran and his hard work interpreting the Echo Arcana, it is possible to travel through time to Castle Aranea.

You realize what that means, right?

We can retrieve the crown before something bad happens to it."Consider it done."

Thank you.

If the crown is truly as sacred as it's described in the documents, it would be the perfect gift for Velik.

[Speak to {@linkcreature:183#7004#Murakan} to enter Castle Aranea.]
(There's a glowing crown in the crate.)

This is the Eternal Crown?

It's so rusty and old though..."It wasn't when I found it."

You mean that it wasn't like this in the past?

We should ask Halran if he has any insights.
With all the work he has done with the Echo Arcana, he must at least have a theory.

Please get the crown to {@linkcreature:183#1025#Halran}.

I'll be right there.

That crown...
I see.

It is simple.

The seven stones that empower the crown are missing.

They must have come loose from the crown during your return from the past."How do you know this?"

Because the stone I am holding in my hand belongs to the Eternal Crown.

This is the Regeneration Stone. Take it and place it near the crown.

If the crown deems you worthy, the stone will return to its original position.

Go ahead.

Look. The crown has regained some of its glow.

You must carry it with you on your journeys, so that it may regain its original form.

To restore the crown, you must recover all the stones."How do I do that?"

The stones won't reveal themselves if they don't think you're capable of handling them.

In other words, if you want to find the stones, you must demonstrate that your are worthy of them.

This is all I know...

May Oriyn's wisdom guide your path.

So...

To restore the crown's true appearance, we must gather the rest of the stones, and you must be powerful enough to find them.

If there's anything I can do to help, just let me know."You can count on me."

I'm a bit relieved now.
, you're my only hope.

Please, take this.
It will help you on your journey.

I'll see if I can find any more information about the current whereabouts of the stones.
I hope to see you soon.
